124d8f1c-a67d-4411-a83e-9bd6dbb195c4.name: Directional
124d8f1c-a67d-4411-a83e-9bd6dbb195c4.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

e4eff26e-2c7e-4f3f-b75c-578bb21d0552.name: Tough Skin
e4eff26e-2c7e-4f3f-b75c-578bb21d0552.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

5810dd36-09e6-4b0f-b9cd-4648ddf624dd.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

6a860b91-0243-4288-bcf5-38dd402422fd.name: Frequency: Constantly
6a860b91-0243-4288-bcf5-38dd402422fd.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

7ee7f35d-6b0f-41ae-ba02-8e54f9db7abb.name: Frequency: Hourly
7ee7f35d-6b0f-41ae-ba02-8e54f9db7abb.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

085c3bd7-d178-425d-a944-e6f657845360.name: Frequency: Daily
085c3bd7-d178-425d-a944-e6f657845360.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

66ee1d2b-0cab-47bb-8810-63a692e99391.name: Frequency: Weekly
66ee1d2b-0cab-47bb-8810-63a692e99391.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

d15f905b-ba01-4985-a95d-6f0de9650db3.name: Frequency: Monthly
d15f905b-ba01-4985-a95d-6f0de9650db3.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

cdf1ce45-c667-4276-ada2-b2ffaab7ea81.name: Frequency: Seasonally
cdf1ce45-c667-4276-ada2-b2ffaab7ea81.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

85399224-d2c1-4a96-ab4d-4e28b4ded020.name: Frequency: Yearly
85399224-d2c1-4a96-ab4d-4e28b4ded020.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

21626e6e-c494-4a96-b083-03441861148b.name: Aging
21626e6e-c494-4a96-b083-03441861148b.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

b5a65c07-23c6-4923-b329-9f3aa8bada5f.name: Selfless
b5a65c07-23c6-4923-b329-9f3aa8bada5f.notes: You must make a self-control roll to put your needs – even survival – before those of someone else.
